sentences.en: A good ruler will not oppress the poor.
sentences.cn: 好的统治者不会压迫贫民.

sentences.en: And the chance to fight those who would oppress others.
sentences.cn: 还有那可能同压迫势力对抗的机会.

sentences.en: At power new sheriff, and bad boys oppress nation.
sentences.cn: 在新郡治安官的管辖下, 坏人当道压迫人民.

sentences.en: He does not oppress anyone, but returns what he took in pledge for a loan.
sentences.cn: 未曾亏负人, 乃将欠债之人的当头还给他.

sentences.en: Laugh or cry as you like, and it's meaningless to oppress yourself.
sentences.cn: 所以请想笑就笑,想哭就哭,该爱的时候就去爱, 没必要压抑自己.

sentences.en: Laugh or cry as you, and it is meaningless to oppress yourself!
sentences.cn: 想笑就笑,想哭就哭,该爱的时候就去爱, 无谓压抑自己!

sentences.en: Meager income and terrible working condition oppress her imaginative spirit.
sentences.cn: 微薄的收入和工作条件,可怕的压迫,她富有想象力的精神.

sentences.en: native tribes oppressed by the authorities
sentences.cn: 受到当局压迫的土著部落

sentences.en: No enemy will subject him to tribute ; no wicked man will oppress him.
sentences.cn: 22仇敌必不勒索他、凶恶之子、也不苦害他.

sentences.en: No sooner had he arrived in Darien than he began to oppress and kill the Indians.
sentences.cn: 他一到达里安,就着手压迫,杀害印第安人.

sentences.en: The boar of Totnes shall succeed the Giant and will oppress the people with grievous tyranny.
sentences.cn: Totnes的野猪会继巨人之后,用令人忧伤的暴政来压迫人们.

sentences.en: The gloom in the chapel oppressed her.
sentences.cn: 小教堂的阴暗气氛使她感到压抑。

sentences.en: The imperialists exploit and oppress all the peoples of the world.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义者剥削和压迫全世界人民.

sentences.en: The main problem with thin people is they oppress.
sentences.cn: 瘦人的主要问题是让人感到压抑.

sentences.en: The people cannot exercise dictatorship over themselves, nor must one section of the people oppress another.
sentences.cn: 人民自己不能向自己专政, 不能由一部分人民去压迫另一部分人民.

sentences.en: Women are often oppress by men in the past.
sentences.cn: 过去,妇女常常受男子的压制.

sentences.en: Yi - meng people have tenacious fighting spirit opposing oppress and exploitage.
sentences.cn: 沂蒙人民富有顽强的反压迫、反剥削的斗争精神.

words.tran_cn: 压迫的；沉重的；压制性的；难以忍受的
压抑；镇压；压迫手段；沉闷；苦恼
压迫，压抑；使……烦恼；使……感到沉重

trans.tran_cn: 虐待，欺侮，〈古〉压倒，给与沉重的感觉
trans.tran_en: to treat a group of people unfairly or cruelly, and prevent them from having the same rights that other people in society have

trans.tran_cn: 使烦恼，使意气消沉，使气馁，使无精神，压迫，压制
trans.tran_en: to treat a group of people unfairly or cruelly, and prevent them from having the same rights that other people in society have
